name: Product Requirements Document
content:
This project is a text visualization tool called TextViz.
 It supports multiple editor types: Markdown, LaTeX, Mermaid, and JSON Builder.
 It features user authentication via Supabase.
 It includes an AI assistant named 'Textie'.
 Users can save and manage documents in a repository.
 The UI is built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui components.
 State management is handled by Zustand.
